website_summaries.verdict: With dual temperature settings, this unit evenly melts your candy and keeps it ready to use for up to 12 hours.
pros: Keeps melted candy warm for 12 hours
Stainless steel melting bowl has 2-pound capacity
cons: Doesn't work well for making molded chocolates

customer_reviews.title: Use caution when making a partial batch.
customer_reviews.text: I often make small batches of chocolate for tasting, etc. I found that when doing a smaller batch of chocolate it is much safer to set the melter to warm, not MELT. If you walk away for a moment you can return to find your chocolate has seized. A lot of unnecessary work may be required to correct the problem. So small batches? Do not set to melt!
customer_reviews.author: Erica Greenwood

customer_reviews.title: Great for your holiday recipes
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a birthday gift for my daughter-in-law. Last Christmas she borrowed mine to use to make her Christmas candy. She makes a lot candy to give as gifts! This chocolate melter is great. I use mine for a lot of different recipes, not just at Christmas. I recently used it to make hot fudge sauce. It melted the bakers chocolate quickly and it was very smooth. Sometimes if you use the microwave it gets kind of clumpy. Not with this melter. I know she will use it a lot and enjoy it as much as I have enjoyed mine!
customer_reviews.author: L Compher

customer_reviews.title: Life saver for making candy
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this. I spend about 8 days making homemade candies at Christmas and this is a life saver. I use to melt chocolates over the stove in a pan and with you turn to melt and it melts beautifully, then turn it to keep warm and it keeps it at a perfect temperature all day long.
customer_reviews.author: Kristene Sinden

customer_reviews.title: Chocomaker is A++
customer_reviews.text: Never made candy apples before but decided to go with this melting pot vs the silicone one because silicone can rip easy and I don't want to keep replacing silicone inserts. Made the apples for the first time, it heated the chocolate so smoothly. Just stir as it heats. Cleanup was fast and easy too. I need to buy another for the caramel! This is more expensive then the silicone one but this should last longer because it doesn't tear. Happy dipping!
customer_reviews.author: Dee P

customer_reviews.title: WASTE OF MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Choco Maker was Amazon prime and recommendation for purchase by Amazon. I felt confident the melter would be just what I needed to melt chocolate bark for dipping the candy I was making for Christmas. Received on December 22, took out of the box on December 23 and was so disappointed, the control knob did work and it did not heat. When I checked on returning this piece of nonworking cheaply made piece of plastic, it is NON RETURNABLE. What a waste of $37.00 from my checking account.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette B Fulton

customer_reviews.title: Good for melts
customer_reviews.text: This got me through the holiday season, I am not sure how I did without this but I threw my double boiler away! I heated the melts up then turned it warm and I was able to dip without the pressure of it getting hard before I was done. This only works with the Wilton candy melts, I tried using chocolate chips and they did not work. I will update after I try using the Ghiradelli melts.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: This is a great value and easy for children to use as well
customer_reviews.text: My husbands daughter borrowed one of these melting pots from a friend. I found myself using it so much that I did not want to return it to her. So I bought her a new one! So easy to use and clean. Keeps whatever you have in there the perfect temperature. I did have a few user errors switching from melting to warming and the chocolate will dry up on you. I recommend setting yourself a timer simply as a reminder to switch the control.
customer_reviews.author: Anne French

customer_reviews.title: Perfection!!
customer_reviews.text: So happy to get this! I made Butterscotch Hay Stacks today with it and it made it SO easy to melt the Butterscotch! Highly recommend! Fast shipment! A++++
customer_reviews.author: Susan Yearout

customer_reviews.title: Great Machine.......
customer_reviews.text: i cannot day enough about this ChocoMaker right here. Every year during the Holidays we make tons of candy. And let me tell you this THING IS THE BOMB! It kept the melted chocolate at the perfect temp. It does a little while to melt it but than after that it maintains it at just the right temperature and I no longer had to make continuous trips to the microwave to keep reheating the chocolate and getting those little balls in it, and it was a perfect consistency. I would highly recommend this. Oh and the cleanup was super easy as well.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Fun and works well!!!
customer_reviews.text: Works well!! Fun night of covering EVERYTHING in chocolate!!! Pretzels, strawberries, marshmallows, graham crackers, bananas and even just spoonfuls!!! This works perfectly!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Plymale

customer_reviews.title: JUNK - Not Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for and this item is CHEAP. The inner melting pan handle will bend under any weight. The heating unit does not get hot enough to melt chocolate. You could put an additive into the chocolate to make it thinner but you should not have to do that and don't if you stick with a double boiler. In addition the company apparently does not acept returns so you are throwing your money out the window if you buy this junk.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Buyers Beware!!
customer_reviews.text: This item was did not work at ALL and when I went to return it or get it replaced, it said it is not eligible for either! Highly disappointed! DO NOT BUY!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Monica Bliss

customer_reviews.title: The worse chocolate melter I bought?
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Item and known I wasn't able to send it back really upsets me! I had tried melting chocolate wafer's and all it did was ended up being cold and not staying warm like it said? It made the chocolate get hard and and messy and I couldn't use it! I wouldn't recommend buying it to anybody else! It's not worth the money even if it's not that much! Thank You P.S. I wish I could of got a refund for it?
customer_reviews.author: Renee Ledesma

customer_reviews.title: We are using it to melt wax, which we ...
customer_reviews.text: We are using it to melt wax, which we dip the wine bottles into - sealing wax. It is very slow...it takes about 3 hours to reach the correct consistancy - but it works.
customer_reviews.author: Mary K. Hyatt

customer_reviews.title: Love my Chocomaker Candy Melter.
customer_reviews.text: So very easy. Chocolate stayed at a perfect temperature. It works right into recipe timing. I saved 20 minutes overall. Chocolate stayed perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love it bowl is large enough so I can dip at least two dozen strawberries
customer_reviews.author: tim foote

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Having this is so much easier than a double boiler. It melts fast and stays consistent. I'm able to walk away and take a break. I do allot of chocolate candy at Christmas and this is awesome. I just wish it had a cover or even a second melting bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Heather mammel

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this quality product. The stainless steel pan is well-made. I expect it to last a long time. Capacity is over 2 cups. I was able to make some delicious chocolate by pouring in 1 cup of tiny chocolate chips (normally used for baking) and about 1 tsp of canola oil. It turned out smooth and delicious and melted in about 15 minutes after turning on the power, stirring occasionally. It kept it melted without scorching.
customer_reviews.author: jdplat

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This chocolate melting pot is fantastic. It melted the chocolate perfectly and kept it at the right consistency the entire time I needed.
customer_reviews.author: momraisin2

customer_reviews.title: Time Saver!!!
customer_reviews.text: So relieved not to have to use the microwave every 10-15 minutes 🙌🏽 Worked well, kept chocolate tempered and ready for dipping!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Great melting/dipping product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this unit,the melting pot is a wonderful size,holds more than we thought it could. The warming feature is also a very big plus!
customer_reviews.author: Gina L. Russell

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It’s amazing. I love it. I need to purchase another. At first I read the reviews and thought o shouldn’t buy. Let me tell you those bad reviews are wrong. I love this item.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Broken from factory
customer_reviews.text: Product was broken from the start I unwrapped it only to find the control switch was broken And to make matters worse it’s non returnable and I see why It’s cheaply made
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is JUNK!
customer_reviews.text: I only used this once and like a similar review, the knob was loose and the second time I used it, it no longer worked. You can't return it. Amazon should take this product off their website!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lou Shuster

customer_reviews.title: for Chocolate Lovers
customer_reviews.text: Great for the grandsons helping to coat their cookie dough truffles or fruit like we did for Mothers Day - they dipped the strawberries into the chocolate - they had a blast -
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: What a wonderful surprise!
customer_reviews.text: Few products exceed my expectations. But this one did. After months of making chocolate covered treats with my 7 and 10 year old daughters, I was still getting inconsistent results with the microwave. Sometimes chocolate burnt in spots, even though I used half power and in 20 second increments. With this melter, the chocolate is perfectly melted and easily distributed on the treats. It is easy to clean and compact; and for the first time my daughters can do the work on their own. The chocolate melts beautifully under the "melt" setting, and then keeps perfectly warmed on the "warm" setting.
customer_reviews.author: Sleepyhead

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We use it for melting soy wax. It works quickly and effectively. It does not burn the wax.
customer_reviews.author: M Phelps

customer_reviews.title: Not working
customer_reviews.text: This isn’t melting anything anymore and I haven’t even had it for a year. Not impressed with how quickly it took a crap.
customer_reviews.author: Hailey

customer_reviews.title: This melter is a great addition to my growing candy-making tools
customer_reviews.text: This melter is a great addition to my growing candy-making tools. I like the capacity, the large opening for dipping and the fact that it cleans up quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Jane E. Canterbury

customer_reviews.title: No more scorched chocolate for this guy!
customer_reviews.text: Have actually had this for a couple years now, it has really gotten a workout!! Clean up is a snap!
customer_reviews.author: David J Smith

customer_reviews.title: Item arrived broken!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY!!!! Item arrived broken, now that I would like to exchange or return I am unable to.
customer_reviews.author: LuckYang

customer_reviews.title: Perfect temperature!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! I've used it many times and it keeps chocolate at a perfect temperature during several hours. I definitely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Catalina Parra

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Just wish it had a lid
customer_reviews.text: Works great ! Just wish it had a lid, clear one preferably !
customer_reviews.author: H.

customer_reviews.title: I gave poor review before on accident
customer_reviews.text: This item keeps the chocolate at the perfect temp. It worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Colbert

customer_reviews.title: Perfect melter
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for small or medium jobs. Consistent temperature. Nice wide opening at about 7". Relatively deep at about 5 to 6 inches. Holds bout 2+ lbs of compound coating. Would recommend to any friend. Safe product as well as wont scorch your product. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: peacsu

customer_reviews.title: The melter worked great, but in the product description two molds and ...
customer_reviews.text: The melter worked great, but in the product description two molds and a dipping fork should have been included. They were not, so now I am disappointed and feel like I paid more than I should have.
customer_reviews.author: Kristal D

customer_reviews.title: why I like this chocolate melter
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product because you can keep the chocolate warm and workable for hours without fear of burning it. I have two.... one for white chocolate and one for milk chocolate. This makes it easy when you are decorating fruits or cakes. It holds a nice amount at a time too. Another thing I love about this product is that it's easy to clean. Yeah! After decorating all day...who wants to spend a lot of time cleaning up? So, buy and enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Let's talk

customer_reviews.title: Actully i didnt use it until now cause i didnt ...
customer_reviews.text: Actully i didnt use it until now cause i didnt find the matching adaptar to plug in electrecity Hope you can help
customer_reviews.author: Nada

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work!
customer_reviews.text: This did not work at all. We ended up using a double boiler on the stove to dip our strawberries for our wedding. Wasted a lot of fruit and pretzels trying to use this thing- the were simply unpresentable to people.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for more than Chocolates
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it works well with chocolate, but we purchased it as a way of melting our ComposiMold and it worked well for that as well. With the melter setting, the mold making material or chocolate melts fast and then the warm function keeps it warm without overheating for as long as we like. This was very useful for us for demonstration purposes. We now use two of these melters when we give demonstrations: one for the chocolate and one for the ComposiMold. So far we have used our first one for about a year with good success. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: ComposiMold

customer_reviews.title: This was a huge improvement over the last Melter. ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a huge improvement over the last Melter. My problem was temperature control that turned the chocolate white. This problem was almost completely eliminated with this Melter. It's very (VERY) important to carefully read the instructions provided. They are short but clear and accurate.
customer_reviews.author: CRICKER JR

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Product!
customer_reviews.text: This did not thoroughly melt my chocolate. I needed to melt it in the microwave and then pour in the stainless steel container. It DID NOT keep the chocolate hot enough to dip my coconut eggs. It got very lumpy. I was so disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Makes cake balls effortless
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I have made cake balls in the past and it was very difficult to keep the chocolate perfectly melted. Using the ChocoMaker changed everything. It makes everything incredibly easy, wayyyy easier than both of us expected. I would recommend purchasing a utensil for dipping along with the melter.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Cvanciger

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I make chocolate dipped pretzels for my grandchildren and this makes the process so much easier. I am very pleased with this product. I particularly like the metal bowl with handle. Cleanup is a snap. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: barbara b

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Easy to use and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Love it ! Easy to use and easy to clean ! I ordered 2 and so far it was a good investment
customer_reviews.author: Ilove2shop

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It's clean and easy to use! I just wish Choco Maker would bring back their dark chocolate 1 lb bars for melting!!!
customer_reviews.author: Fran Rambo

customer_reviews.title: Cracked!
customer_reviews.text: The plastic was broken when I received mine. I kept it because I was making cake pops for a party that week and could not get a replacement in time.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Garman

customer_reviews.title: Too Hot for Temper
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't keep a low enough temperature to keep chocolate in temper, but I've managed to rig something decent by stacking a few bowls. Does the trick to keep cocoa butter melted.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Great chocolate melter
customer_reviews.text: Big bowl holds a lot of chocolate and hearts it up quickly
customer_reviews.author: emeek

customer_reviews.title: TOTALLY AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing in the world to me. I can't seem to melt chocolate so this melter is the best thing since sliced bread,,,,,REALLY
customer_reviews.author: Joyce M. Eubanks

customer_reviews.title: Great fun
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife and she has enjoyed using it to spoil our grandchildren
customer_reviews.author: Reed St Clair

customer_reviews.title: chocolate melter
customer_reviews.text: missing dipping tool ,molds. as advertised shipment arrived on time but different carton then shown on line. looks like the old bait an swap
customer_reviews.author: tim

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this thing. I use it all the time and it always heats the chocolate perfectly. I wish I had not waited so long to order it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wohlscheid

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Much easier than the double boiler method, don't know how I ever did without it
customer_reviews.author: Banis

customer_reviews.title: Candy melter
customer_reviews.text: Have 2 of these already but granddaughters Easter eggs sale s this year were out of sight. So I ordered another one so we had 3 going at one time. Works very well and cleans up well! Would buy another one if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't recommend
customer_reviews.text: The melter did not work well. Chocolate did not melt at all. Wound up using my double boiler. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Annette D. Maisler

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Melts chocolate awesomely! Works fast and is just big enough for most projects.
customer_reviews.author: B. Bies

customer_reviews.title: Great! It's larger than my other one
customer_reviews.text: Great! It's larger than my other one. Now I use the big one for milk chocolate and the smaller one for dark chocolate. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Leshia Bodo

customer_reviews.title: Dead on Arrival!
customer_reviews.text: "Dead on Arrival". Off/On switch frozen. Poorly constructed, terrible assembly process. Screw head holding switch in-place, stripped. Do not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: ... I will rate it high as it looks so nice
customer_reviews.text: I have not used it yet I will rate it high as it looks so nice
customer_reviews.author: P. Barnes

product_meta.title: ChocoMaker Inc. Dress My Cupcake Chocomaker Candy Melter
product_meta.description:
Our ChocoMaker Candy Melter is perfect at melting chocolate for decorating cake pops, molding candies, fondue and more! 

The 2 pound capacity makes it a perfect size for chocolate parties and home or office entertaining. With a dual-temperature control switch and pour spout, the ChocoMaker Candy Melter is easy to use and clean. 

The Candy Melter is not a chocolate-tempering machine.
feature_bullets: Our candy melter keeps candy making at home simple
A candy makers dream. This melter can keep your candy warm 12 hours
Stainless steel bowl melting pot has a two pound capacity
Pair this with other candy making products, such as wrappers and liners, stands, tissue poms, vintage paper straws, molds or dipping tools

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars144 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
